author: Matt Stieb
title: Low Coronavirus Mutation Rate Gives Researchers Hope for a Single Vaccine
description: Because COVID-19 has not mutated significantly, researchers believe one longterm vaccine — similar to the measles or chickenpox — could be possible.
content:
